item.description: Its been way to long since everyone has been together.  We were thinking of getting a meetup in before the end of the month if the weather cooperates.  This meetup is scheduled right now for the Sunday during the holiday weekend.  After that maybe one a couple weeks later in June so we can get back on track.  Also, we were wondering if anyone in the group would be interested in becoming a co-organizer for the outdoor meetups. Our schedules (mostly Joe's) do not leave a lot of weekend days and we have a tendency to schedule the meetups on our availability.  We would rather have more convenient meetups for the majority of the group even if we cannot be there with Winnie.

group.name: The Worcester English Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: MAY MEETUP
